summary: CRITICAL BUG FIXED: PDF generation now working perfectly after jspdf downgrade. Completed comprehensive testing of SVRN Tax Simulator with 100% success rate across all core functionalities.

minor_bugs.issue: Slider programmatic value changes via JavaScript may not trigger visual updates consistently
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - manual slider interaction works perfectly, only affects automated testing

passed_tests: ✅ CRITICAL: PDF generation working perfectly (jspdf v2.5.1 + jspdf-autotable v3.8.2)
✅ PDF downloads successfully with proper filename and content
✅ Multiple PDF generation scenarios tested successfully
✅ Mathematical calculations 100% accurate (verified with multiple test cases)
✅ Test case 1: R$2500 cost → R$4166.67 current, R$5154.64 suggested (-46.0% impact)
✅ Test case 2: R$1000 cost → R$1724.14 current, R$2298.85 suggested (-48.3% impact)
✅ All 4 input fields functional (Nome, Custo, Margem, Carga Tributária)
✅ Results display in 3 cards (Cenário Atual, Cenário 2026, Recomendação SVRN)
✅ Dark mode theme with royal blue (#0047AB) and gold gradient colors
✅ Mobile responsiveness (390x844) - all elements visible and functional
✅ SVRN branding and footer properly implemented
✅ No console errors during any operations
✅ Gradient backgrounds and premium design elements working
